GPUImageAVCamera Class Reference

Inherits from GPUImageOutput : NSObject
Conforms to AVCaptureAudioDataOutputSampleBufferDelegate
AVCaptureVideoDataOutputSampleBufferDelegate
Declared in GPUImageAVCamera.h

Overview

A GPUImageOutput that provides frames from either camera

Properties

captureSession

The AVCaptureSession used to capture from the camera

@property (readonly, retain, nonatomic) AVCaptureSession *captureSession

Declared In

GPUImageAVCamera.h

captureSessionPreset

This enables the capture session preset to be changed on the fly

@property (readwrite, nonatomic, copy) NSString *captureSessionPreset

Declared In

GPUImageAVCamera.h

delegate

@property (nonatomic, assign) id<GPUImageVideoCameraDelegate> delegate

frameRate

Setting this to 0 or below will set the frame rate back to the default setting for a particular preset.

@property (readwrite) NSInteger frameRate

Declared In

GPUImageAVCamera.h

frontFacingCameraPresent

Easy way to tell if front-facing camera is present on device

@property (readonly, getter=isFrontFacingCameraPresent) BOOL frontFacingCameraPresent

Declared In

GPUImageAVCamera.h

horizontallyMirrorRearFacingCamera

These properties determine whether or not the two camera orientations should be mirrored. By default, both are NO.

@property (readwrite, nonatomic) BOOL horizontallyMirrorFrontFacingCamera , horizontallyMirrorRearFacingCamera

Declared In

GPUImageAVCamera.h

inputCamera

Use this property to manage camera settings. Focus point, exposure point, etc.

@property (readonly) AVCaptureDevice *inputCamera

Declared In

GPUImageAVCamera.h

runBenchmark

This enables the benchmarking mode, which logs out instantaneous and average frame times to the console

@property (readwrite, nonatomic) BOOL runBenchmark

Declared In

GPUImageAVCamera.h
